Book fair at Pine Valley School library
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Children sit and stand while reading books.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Books; Children; Interiors; Libraries; Pine Valley School (Oak Ridge, Tenn.); Reading; Schools

Barnes, Arthur; Ceress, Jeanette; Davis, Ronald; Grant, Cleo; Hicks, Jacqueline; Hodge, Gary Victor; Johnson, Jo Ann; Kay, Loretta; Krogere, Judith Sue; Sutton, Patricia; Tennant, ReNee; Wiley, Jo Pat; Zarnell, John E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of November 23, 1945. Seated, left to right , Gary Victor Hodge, Jo Ann Johnson, Judith Sue Krogere, Jacqueline Hicks, Jeanette Ceress (at round table) and John E. Zarnell. Standing, Loretta Kay, ReNee Tennant, Arthur Barnes, Jo Pat Wiley, Patricia Sutton, Cleo Grant and Ronald Davis.
